name: sap-hana-cli
description: Assists with SAP HANA Developer CLI (hana-cli) and AI-driven database operations via MCP integration. Use when: installing hana-cli, connecting to SAP HANA databases with natural language queries, inspecting database objects (tables, views, procedures, functions), managing HDI containers, executing SQL queries, converting metadata to CDS/EDMX/OpenAPI formats, managing SAP HANA Cloud instances, working with BTP CLI integration, or troubleshooting hana-cli commands. Covers: 91 commands, 17+ output formats, HDI container management, cloud operations, natural language database exploration.
